sections: This BMW was built for a high-performance family!
In recent years, the demand for

has skyrocketed. People don’t want to settle for a car they just leave in the garage to take the kids to soccer in their boring car. That’s where the sporty wagons and crossovers came from, and they are all the rage on the market. Cars like this 2015 BMW 328d Sports-Wagon will make sure every trip you take is exciting.

This all-wheel-drive BMW 3 series wagon is powered by a turbodiesel engine. The 328d xDrive Sports Wagon is finished in Melbourne Red Metallic with a Venetian Beige interior. Making it even more attractive, it has over $14k worth of factory options, including the M Sport, Premium, Driver Assistance, Dynamic Handling, and Lighting packages, a power sunroof, Dakota leather upholstery, power-adjustable and heated front seats, dual-zone automatic climate control, a navigation system, and a Harman/Kardon surround sound system. It’s covered in a paint protection film to protect the beautiful red finish, and a M Performance-style front lip spoiler, aftermarket side skirt diffusers, wheels refinished in dark grey, and tinted windows.

Located in Denver, Colorado, Farland Classic Restoration’s consignment program sells classic, exotic and collectible cars on behalf of our customers. We are a licensed dealer and take all the hassle out of the process.
We work mostly with high-end European cars, but also have sold many high end American cars and muscle cars, visit
